statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensor_data WHERE reading_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT AVG(reading_value) AS average_reading FROM sensor_data WHERE location = 'Room B';
SELECT sensor_name, reading_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name = 'Sensor A' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name = 'Sensor B' AND reading_value > 50 ORDER BY reading_value ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, AVG(reading_value) AS average_reading FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING COUNT(sensor_id) > 100 ORDER BY average_reading DESC;
SELECT location, MAX(reading_value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY location HAVING max_value > 75 ORDER BY location;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' OR location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 'f4b75cca-7f76-4b3b-9a95-d4e3213cd3fc';
SELECT maintenance_type, technician FROM maintenance_log WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) FROM maintenance_log GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(value) > 30;
SELECT sensor_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_log WHERE technician = 'John Doe' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS num_maintenance_logs FROM maintenance_log GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING num_maintenance_logs > 2;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM maintenance_log WHERE maintenance_type = 'calibration') GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE data_value > 100;
SELECT sensor_name, timestamp FROM sensors JOIN maintenance_logs ON sensors.sensor_id = maintenance_logs.sensor_id;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM sensors;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT sensors.sensor_name, sensor_data.data_value FROM sensors JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id WHERE sensor_data.timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND sensors.status = 'active';
SELECT sensor_name, location, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE location LIKE '%floor%' OR location LIKE '%room%' AND sensor_type = 'humidity';

SELECT sensors.sensor_name, maintenance_logs.timestamp, maintenance_logs.maintenance_type FROM sensors JOIN maintenance_logs ON sensors.sensor_id = maintenance_logs.sensor_id WHERE maintenance_logs.description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY maintenance_logs.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, reading_value FROM sensors JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_name, prediction_value FROM sensors JOIN predictive_analysis ON sensors.sensor_id = predictive_analysis.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE location='Room A';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, installation_date FROM sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(sensor_id) AS total_sensors FROM sensors;
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type, notes FROM maintenance_records WHERE sensor_id=1;
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT location, installation_date FROM Sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, status FROM Sensors WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(last_reading) AS last_reading FROM Sensors GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM Readings WHERE reading_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY reading_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC, sensor_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT sensor_id, location, status FROM Sensors WHERE status = TRUE AND location LIKE 'Lab%' ORDER BY sensor_id LIMIT 5
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(reading_id) AS num_readings FROM Readings GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING num_readings > 100 ORDER BY num_readings DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT Sensors.sensor_id, location, AVG(reading_value) AS avg_reading FROM Sensors INNER JOIN Readings ON Sensors.sensor_id = Readings.sensor_id GROUP BY Sensors.sensor_id, location ORDER BY avg_reading DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT Sensors.sensor_id, location, COUNT(Alerts.alert_id) AS num_alerts FROM Sensors LEFT JOIN Alerts ON Sensors.sensor_id = Alerts.sensor_id GROUP BY Sensors.sensor_id, location ORDER BY num_alerts DESC LIMIT 5
